column4: I have a nVidia 6150 on my HP Tx1003  notebook . nVidia-seetings reports the temprature at 77C which i dont think is normal . Please HelP !!!
i have a feeling the GPU fan is not turned on
how can i confirm weather or not my gpu fan is running
the hptx1000 is got a buggy bios , i have to use a whole lot of kernel paramaeters to boot up
Put your ear to it, if it sounds like it's running, then it is..otherwise, you're cooking your CPU
the cpu fan is certainly runing
Okay....and I should ask, do you have a desktop or a laptop?
Does your lappy have side vents?
What does your screen look like....any red spots?
jsut checked the cpu is running at 47
So...the video is okay? What makes you think the vid card is running hot?
Then I would have it checked out.
It's a laptop, so I'm not sure how, but waiting on someone to tell you is waiting for impending damage to it. :-)
i have been using the laptop for about 4 months now
